title: We Might Regret This review - brilliant disabled-led comedy continues to skewer its targets
desc: Filmed last summer as the government sought to cut disability benefits, this groundbreaking show about an artist and her best friend is laugh-out-loud funny

title: Bird Flu Strikes California Elephant Seals for the First Time
desc: Thirty seals, primarily weaned pups, have died since late last week, scientists said.

title: Ann Godoff, a Top Editor and Publisher of Best Sellers, Dies at 76
desc: Considered an “author’s publisher” at Random House and then Penguin, she cultivated the careers of dozens of celebrated novelists and nonfiction writers.

title: UK police complete search of Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor's home
desc: The former royal was arrested last week on suspicion of misconduct in public office, with authorities carrying out searches at his Royal Lodge home.

title: AMC Theatres to Save Their "Best Seats" for VIP Loyalty Program Members
desc: After a somewhat similar pilot program received backlash three years ago, AMC has come up with a new strategy to reward their most spend-y customers with their best seats.

title: Lake Tekapo faces accommodation squeeze as holiday crowds surge
desc: Some providers are using the demand to justify charging visitors thousands of dollars a night for a room.

title: Paris Saint-Germain edge Monaco to reach Champions League last 16
desc: Paris Saint-Germain survived a tense night against Monaco on Wednesday, drawing the second leg but advancing on aggregate after playing much of the match against 10 men. Late drama and a red card shifted…

title: Cuba says boat from Florida opened fire at its soldiers, starting fight that killed 4
desc: Cuban forces killed four people and wounded six others aboard a Florida-based speedboat that entered Cuban waters and opened fire on a Cuban patrol, the country's government says.

title: Motion to oppose U.S. ICE deployment in Vancouver ruled out of order
desc: Mike Klassen said there has been no indication that Immigration and Customs Enforcement officers (ICE) will be deployed during the World Cup.

title: Vance says Minnesota’s Medicaid funds halted as part of Trump’s ‘war on fraud’
desc: Vice-president makes announcement with Mehmet Oz, who says other states will be next after Minnesota
